simplesect.para:
This filter is found in
Filters Colors Value Invert

This filter inverts Value (luminosity) of the active layer or selection. Hue and Saturation will not be affected, althogh the color will sometimes be slightly different because of roundoff error. If you want to invert Hue and Saturation also, use
Layers Colors Invert .

Note that for very dark colors, the hue and saturation can be distorted quite a bit by this filter. This happens because any maximally bright color - bright green, bright red, white, whatever - when value-inverted produces black. Thus, you should not expect to be able to apply this filter twice in a row and get back the image you started with.
Ce filtre se trouve à Image>Filtres/Couleurs/Inversion de valeur

Ce filtre inverse la Valeur (luminosité) du calque courant ou de la sélection. La teinte et la saturation ne sont pas affectées et la couleur restera la même, mais d'une nuance différente. Si vous voulez inverser aussi la Teinte et la Saturation, utilisez
